data.text: Yaabi bɔrɔxɔxi mixi bɔɲɛ ragoroma nɛ,
Xaxilima xa wɔyɛnyi a niyama nɛ xaxili fanyi xa rafan mixie ma,
Alatala mixi birin matoma,
Wɔyɛn fanyi mixi rayalanma,
Xaxilitare yoma nɛ a baba xa marasi ma,
Harige fanyi na tinxintɔɛ xɔnyi,
Lɔnnilae xa wɔyɛnyie xaxili fima nɛ mixi ma,
Alatala mixi ɲaaxi xa sɛrɛxɛ xɔnma,
Alatala mixi ɲaaxi xa kira xɔnma,
Kira fanyi bɛɲinfe findima ɲaxankatɛ nan na.
Alatala to fe birin kolon,
Yɛtɛ igboe mu wama marasi xɔn ma,
Bɔɲɛ sɛɛwaxi mixi lahalɛ fanma,
Xaxilima lɔnni nan fenma,
Hali misikiinɛ tɔɔrɔ a xa simaya kui,
Setare Ala yaragaaxui,
Bande ɲiɲɛ donfe xanunteya kui,
Bɔɲɛ rate gere xɔrɛ isɔxɔma nɛ,
Tunnaxɔnɛ xa kira mabalanxi tunbee nan na,
Di lɔnnixi findima sɛɛwɛ nan na a baba bɛ,
Xaxilitareɲa rafan lɔnnitare ma,
Marasitareɲa wali kanama nɛ,
Sɛɛwɛ na mixi bɛ naxan fata a boore yaabide.
Xaxilima xa kira a ratema nɛ koore ma,
Alatala yɛtɛ igboe xa banxi rabirama nɛ,
Maɲɔxun kobi raɲaaxu Alatala ma,
Milante findima nɛ tɔɔrɛ ra a xa denbaya bɛ,
Tinxintɔɛ fe matoma nɛ a fanyi ra beenu a xa yaabi nde fi,
Alatala makuya mixi ɲaaxie ra,
Xɛɛra ya iyalanxi mixi bɔɲɛ rasɛɛwama nɛ,
Mixi naxan a tuli matima kisi marasi ra,
Naxan tondima marasi ramɛde,
Ala xa yaragaaxui findima lɔnni nan na mixi bɛ.
